trans-unit.source: Program Structure and Code Conventions (Visual Basic) | Microsoft Docs
trans-unit.target: 程序结构和代码约定 (Visual Basic 中) |Microsoft 文档

trans-unit.source: Program Structure and Code Conventions (Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: 程序结构和代码约定 (Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: This section introduces the typical [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] program structure, provides a simple [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] program, "Hello, World", and discusses [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] code conventions.
trans-unit.target: 本部分介绍的典型[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]程序结构中，提供了一个简单[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]程序，"Hello，World"，并讨论了[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]代码约定。

trans-unit.source: Code conventions are suggestions that focus not on a program's logic but on its physical structure and appearance.
trans-unit.target: 代码约定是针对不是程序的逻辑，而是其物理结构和外观的建议值。

trans-unit.source: Following them makes your code easier to read, understand, and maintain.
trans-unit.target: 按照它们使您的代码易于阅读、 理解和维护。

trans-unit.source: Code conventions can include, among others:
trans-unit.target: 其他项中，代码约定，可以包括︰

trans-unit.source: Standardized formats for labeling and commenting code.
trans-unit.target: 添加标记和注释的代码的标准化的格式。

trans-unit.source: Guidelines for spacing, formatting, and indenting code.
trans-unit.target: 间距、 格式和缩进代码的指南。

trans-unit.source: Naming conventions for objects, variables, and procedures.
trans-unit.target: 对象、 变量和过程的命名约定。

trans-unit.source: The following topics present a set of programming guidelines for [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)] programs, along with examples of good usage.
trans-unit.target: 下列主题显示了一组编程指导方针[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../../csharp/programming-guide/concepts/linq/includes/vbprvb_md.md)]计划，以及一些很好的用法示例。

trans-unit.source: In This Section
trans-unit.target: 本节内容
